name: TypeRace
description:
Avoid the cars coming in front of you by combining letters to make words.

you can see the letters at the bottom of the screen,

you have only three lives so type fast.

The Game was created for Bevy Jam #2

The assets are from Kenney pack  
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/racing-pack

And created thanks to Midjourney AI
https://www.midjourney.com/home/

The music is by Rolando Gomez
RolandoGomez@gmx.com
https://www.fiverr.com/musicalroly
